name: Integrity (itch)
description:
In the dark pandemic world one man stands up to resist the enigmatic opressors.

Your objective on each level is to destroy the 5g towers threatening your neighbourhood and to leave undetected.  

Movement -> WASD

Roll -> SPACE. Roll leaves a dust cloud behind you, wich helps to escape drone vision.

Roll charge is spend on usage. Toilet paper and beer refill the charge(max 2).

The interface is not yet translated to english. =(
